name: JAVASTATICMETHOD
desc: Invoke a static Java method, then push the output on the stack unless output type is void.

params.args: List of arguments to pass to the method.
params.path: Fully qualified name, ie *package.class.method*, of the method to invoke. If the class was imported, can be *class.method*. If the method was imported, can be *method*.
params.output: Output of invoked static method if not void.
